posts.post_content: I’m looking to buy a few T213 Coupons cards if anyone has some available. I’m open to any type (1-3) and fine with raw or graded. I only have T213-2 Heinie Wagner and Merkle so far, so could use any others.

I have a few listed on my website....under Tobacco Cards

[url]www.luckeycards.com[/url]


[IMG]https://luckeycards.com/baker1.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks for the link. Great cards, but a bit out of my budget. I’ve found a few T213-2 cards so far and may stick to that type to keep things a bit more affordable. I’m not terribly familiar with this set yet, so lots to learn.
